case_id: Unique PDC identifier associated with the patient (e.g. looks like 24cb0fcb-63d6-11e8-bcf1-0a2705229b82)
sample_id: Unique PDC identifier associated with the sample (e.g. looks like 1c64cd8f-d028-11ea-b1fd-0aad30af8a83)
aliquot_id: Unique PDC identifier associated with the aliquot (e.g. looks like 1c6638dc-d028-11ea-b1fd-0aad30af8a83)
aliquot_submitter_id: Unique source id provided by the data submitter (e.g. looks like e5e1306b-719e-4c3e-b85b-fd1231_D2)
aliquot_run_metadata_id: Uniquely identifies the aliquot by how it was used in the experiment (based on the labelling reagent and/or biological replicate)
study_name: Name of the study (e.g. Pediatric Brain Cancer Pilot Study - Phosphoproteome)
protein_abundance_log2ratio: Average log-ratio of sample reporter-ion to common reference of peptide ions associated with the gene in acquisitions from a specific biological sample
gene_id: UUID for the gene name (e.g. looks like fa986b85-b814-11e8-907f-0a2705229b82)
authority: The authority by which the designated gene names are derived-- from HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee (HGNC), a resource for approved human gene nomenclature
organism: species investigated in the study (e.g Homo sapiens)
uniprotkb_id: Oldest Swiss-Prot ID associated with this gene, if available; otherwise, oldest UniProt ID
uniprotkb_ids: List of all UniProt accession numbers associated with this gene
proteins: Semi-colon separated list of protein accessions associated with the gene
assays: CPTAC Assay accessions for the peptides associated with the gene
